alert.note: Alert for Morongo Basin; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 12:28PM PST until January 14 at 3:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Morongo Basin and Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Areas of blowing dust causing reduced visibility expected.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.
